name: Kas Viewer
author: Wladimir A. Jimenez B.

sections.description:
KasViewer is a image, or web content visor, base on sexlightbox script to create a popup box in the same frame to show html content.

This plugins is, in other words, Sexy Lightbox for mootools 1.2.3 to wordpress.

Acknowledgement:
Eduardo D. Sada – http://www.coders.me/web-html-js-css/javascript/sexy-lightbox-2
sections.changelog:
0.1

First Version KasViewer

0.2

Fixied URL Plugins and Home

1.0

Include iframe content to view in box
Include content inline to view in box
Help update
Remove accent in author name
Add settings link on plugins list

1.0.1

Included new kasplugins administrator menu to compatibility with other kasplugins

1.0.2

Fixed kasplugins menu
